title: Franchise value of the Toronto Blue Jays 2002 to 2019
yAxis: Franchise value in million U.S. dollars
summary: In general Franchise value in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Franchise value in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017, and finally roughly constant from 2017 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2016 and 2017.
The highest Franchise value in million U.S. dollars, of value 1350.0 was reached at Year 2018
The lowest Franchise value in million U.S. dollars, of value 900.0 was reported at Year 2016
